meanings.definition: The art of interpreting music through bodily movement.
meanings.sent1: She expressed the music beautifully through eurhythmies.
meanings.sent2: Dancers often use eurhythmies to convey emotions in their performances.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to mimic the eurhythmies of the music.
meanings.sent4: Her eurhythmies were like a graceful dance with the melody.
meanings.sent5: The eurhythmies of the song painted a vivid picture in the audience's minds.

meanings.definition: The practice of rhythmic body movements as a form of expression or exercise.
meanings.sent1: The class enjoyed the eurhythmies session as a fun way to move.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often incorporate eurhythmies into their warm-up routines.
meanings.sent3: The eurhythmies of the group exercise class made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His eurhythmies during the workout were strong and precise.
meanings.sent5: The eurhythmies of the dance routine energized the participants.
